definition: the West/abbr. for Spain 西班牙[Xi1 ban1 ya2]/Spanish

gate/door/CL:扇[shan4]/gateway/doorway/CL:個|个[ge4]/opening/valve/switch/way to do something/knack/family/house/(religious) sect/school (of thought)/class/category/phylum or division (taxonomy)/classifier for large guns/classifier for lessons, subjects, branches of technology/(suffix) -gate (i.e. scandal; derived from Watergate)

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: Its authors had detailed knowledge of Siemens’ software and its security weaknesses.
sentences.chinese: 筆者已經詳細的瞭解了西門子軟件的安全漏洞在哪裏。

sentences.english: Siemens electrical appliances, specialized in optical glass.
sentences.chinese: 西門子電器，專業無花光學玻璃。

sentences.english: Power engineering quickly became a second pillar of Siemens'worldwide business.
sentences.chinese: 電力工程很快成爲西門子全球業務的第二大支柱業務。

sentences.english: Please pay attention to our website for more information.
sentences.chinese: 更多徵文活動信息，請留意西門子網站。

sentences.english: Do you know anything the new Siemen system?
sentences.chinese: 你知道新的西門子系統？

sentences.english: Siemens is helping Shanghai and China do this.
sentences.chinese: 而西門子正助力上海和中國達成這一目標。

sentences.english: The stock was also upgraded to “conviction buy” from “buy” at Goldman Sachs.
sentences.chinese: 高盛集團也把西門子股票評級從買入上調爲強勢買入。

sentences.english: Siemens has positioned USFilter as the cornerstone for the new Siemens Water Technologies global business.
sentences.chinese: 西門子將它定位爲新的西門子水技術全球業務的基礎。

sentences.english: Siemens has positioned USFilter as the cornerstone for the new Siemens Water Technologies global business.
sentences.chinese: 西門子將它定位爲新的西門子水技術全球業務的基礎。

sentences.english: Familiarity with Funuc or Siemens system programming.
sentences.chinese: 熟悉法那克或西門子系統的數控編程。

sentences.english: Tsinghua is very happy to be able to partner with Siemens on the CKI program.
sentences.chinese: 清華大學很高興能與西門子就CKI計劃進行合作。

sentences.english: This article reveals the market situation on gas turbine produced by SIEMENS.
sentences.chinese: 本文介紹了德國西門子公司的燃氣輪機的市場情況。

sentences.english: The vice president of Siemens China, Zhao Hui, is a veteran member of the "Green Collar Club."
sentences.chinese: 中國西門子副總裁趙卉是“綠領俱樂部”的老會員。

sentences.english: For Mr L?scher, this reflects the real strength of Siemens.
sentences.chinese: 在羅旭德看來，這反映了西門子真正的強項。

sentences.english: Siemens was a pioneer in Asia.
sentences.chinese: 西門子在亞洲市場上是個先驅者。

definition: term of office/while holding a post
